qas.question: When did the GSM Association follow suit?
When was this further endorsed by the CTIA?
UCS chargers will also include what?

context: The GSM Association (GSMA) followed suit on <a0_0>17 February 2009<a0_0/>, and on <a1_0>22 April 2009<a1_0/>, this was further endorsed by the CTIA – The Wireless Association, with the International Telecommunication Union (ITU) announcing on 22 October 2009 that it had also embraced the Universal Charging Solution as its "energy-efficient one-charger-fits-all new mobile phone solution," and added: "Based on the Micro-USB interface, UCS chargers will also include <a2_0>a 4-star or higher efficiency rating<a2_0/>—up to three times more energy-efficient than an unrated charger."
